From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To clear the software-cached counter values to start from zero again for a specified VLAN or all existing VLANs, use the **clear vlan counters** command in privileged EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) The ID of a specific VLAN. Range: 1 to 4094.

Examples: Clear "show vlan" counters on this vlan [ confirm ] y
ExtraInfo: If you do not specify a *vlan-id*; the software-cached counter values for all existing VLANs are cleared.
